name: requestSendMessage(_:outData:maxReturnedDataSize:sendMessageDelegate:didSendMessageSelector:contextInfo:)
desc: Asynchronously sends an arbitrary message with optional data to a device.
declaration:
func requestSendMessage(_ messageCode: UInt32, 
                outData data: Data, 
    maxReturnedDataSize: UInt32, 
    sendMessageDelegate: Any, 
 didSendMessageSelector selector: Selector, 
            contextInfo: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?)
